name: AlpineAcceleration Demo
summary:
This game is
This is a trial version of "AlpineAcceleration".

In the Demo version, you can play stages 1, 2, and 7.
If you like it, please purchase the full version!

This game is
The goal of the game is to avoid falling off the stage and hitting obstacles.
Use jumping to reach the goal of the course.

The key is to adjust the timing and speed of your jumps!

Game Controls
Oculus Touch X button Hold
(When you're going downhill / Speed Up)
(On the way up the hill / Reduced deceleration)

Oculus Touch A...
